title: Mordekaiser Skin Glitch
body:
It seems Mordekaiser's skin has two different names. Any Rioters that would care to illuminate the issue?

http://postimg.org/image/bhxnrhkkn/

http://postimg.org/image/rfayfp2ml/

replies.body: I must say, Dark Crusader sounds a lot better than King of Clubs.
Oh you're right, good find. It would be interesting to know why that happened, my guess is that was the skins name in development and somehow it made it onto live servers.
